pullrequest.title: changes form pull request #772 for quickstep.cpp

content.raw:
This causes ODEJoint_TEST to fail for me:
~~~
[ RUN      ] ODEJoint_TEST.GetForceTorqueWithAppliedForce
Msg Waiting for master
Msg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
Msg Publicized address: 192.168.1.187
Dbg ServerFixture load in 0.09 seconds, timeout after 60 seconds
Dbg dt : 0.001
Dbg t after one step : 0.001
Dbg ------------------- PD CONTROL -------------------
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/ode/ODEJoint_TEST.cc:93: Failure
The difference between wrench_01.body1Force.y and 2.0 is 2.0027520573345967, which exceeds 2.0, where
wrench_01.body1Force.y evaluates to -0.0027520573345966295,
2.0 evaluates to 2, and
2.0 evaluates to 2.
[  FAILED  ] ODEJoint_TEST.GetForceTorqueWithAppliedForce (4907 ms)
~~~
Note that in gazebo_2.0 and later, this test is no longer in ODEJoint_TEST (I think it's in Joint_TEST).

The difference between wrench_01.body1Force.y and 2.0 is 2.0027520573345967, which exceeds 2.0, where
wrench_01.body1Force.y evaluates to -0.0027520573345966295,

Note that in gazebo_2.0 and later, this test is no longer in ODEJoint_TEST (I think it's in Joint_TEST).
